billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides that where a person engaged in the business of repairing household appliances identifies a part which will be necessary for repair, it is deemed warranted
summary: Provides that where a person engaged in the business of repairing household appliances identifies a part which will be necessary for repair, it is deemed warranted for the benefit of the consumer, and he shall be entitled to a refund if such part does not in fact repair such appliance.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to home or business visits to repair appliances or equipment
